DOC.brief_title: NGR-hTNF Combination With Standard Chemotherapy Treat Patients With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patient randomly assign standard chemotherapy regimen plus low-dose ( 0.8 mcg/m^2 ) NGR-hTNF standard chemotherapy alone , centralized randomization process use follow stratification factor : performance status ( 0 vs 1 ) histology ( squamous v non-squamous ) . In arm choice two chemotherapy regimen base histologic subtype : patient squamous histology ( include also generic diagnosis NSCLC without subtype classification ) recommend cisplatin/gemcitabine regimen , patient nonsquamous histology ( include adenocarcinoma large-cell carcinoma ) recommend cisplatin/pemetrexed regimen .
